backend/main.mo: Defines data models and in-memory maps for shipments, invoices, clients, payments, accounts, sessions, OTP, and rate limiting, with authorization mixins and admin credentials.
backend/migration.mo: Simple migration module that sets and returns the admin password value.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a frontend requirement for consistent admin login error handling.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files covering components, hooks, utilities, and configurations.
frontend/.env: Contains environment variable for the Google Maps API key.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining CSS variables for themes and applying global background and text colors.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML template loading the React app entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing authentication, landing sections, shipment tracking, and lazy-loaded dashboards.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminClien: Admin view showing a client's details with tabs for managing shipments and invoices.
Form component for adding or updating a client profile, handling validation and submission via a mutation hook.
Dialog for creating and provisioning a client account, including password generation and principal ID validation.
Displays a searchable table of client accounts with options to refresh data and repair unlinked accounts.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Main admin dashboard organizing client management, tracking, revenue, history, and config panels with logout and utility actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGoogl: Panel for checking and storing a Google Geocoding API key, with status alerts and configuration form.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminInvoi: Button that triggers CSV export of all invoices using a mutation and downloads the generated file.
Displays and manages invoices for a client, including creation, deletion, and status handling with dialogs and forms.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLogin: Shows client login history with loading, error, and empty states using a table layout.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminMsg91: Manages MSG91 API key storage and verification with input controls and status alerts.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminReven: Fetches and visualizes revenue data using a line chart with full loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoleM: Static panel explaining that role management is disabled under password-only authentication.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminShipm: Displays and manages client shipments, supporting creation, deletion, and optional coordinates with a form dialog.
frontend/src/components/AdminTrackingPan: Admin map panel that conditionally loads Google Maps and displays shipment markers using fetched shipment data.
frontend/src/components/app/AppErrorBoun: React error boundary that captures and displays application errors with options to refresh or copy details.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Renders an accessâ€‘denied message UI for unauthorized users.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminBootst: Deprecated admin bootstrap card showing that Internet Identity setup is unavailable.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminLoginC: Admin login form using password authentication with error handling and loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminLogout: Logout button that triggers admin logout and scrolls back to the home section.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Deprecated Internet Identity login component that returns null.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Deprecated profile setup dialog with form fields but no active submission logic.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientDas: Client dashboard with tabs for shipments and invoices plus logout and support actions.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientInv: Invoice table for clients with authentication checks, status badges, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientPas: Password change form enforcing validation and submitting via useChangeClientPassword; shows errors and calls onSuccess on completion.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientPor: Auth UI toggling between login and signup tabs, switching back to login after successful signup.
Login card supporting password and OTP modes with validation, error handling, and query-based authentication actions.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientShi: Displays client shipments with authentication checks, loading/error handling, and separation of active vs delivered shipments.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientSig: Signup form validating identifier and password, submitting new client accounts, handling errors, and notifying parent on success.
frontend/src/hooks/ClientSessionProvider: Context provider managing client session tokens in localStorage with helpers for setting and clearing authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminBootstrap.ts: Hooks for checking admin bootstrap status and triggering initial admin creation using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages admin session tokens, including validation, login handling with backend variants, and logout logic with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientSession.ts: Empty file placeholder for client session hook implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for client auth flows, OTP actions, and data fetching/mutations using the backend actor and session state.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup with theme variables, dark mode styles, and custom DFC gold utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/invoicePdf.ts: Generates a printable HTML invoice PDF in a new window using styled templates and auto-print behavior.
frontend/src/lib/shipmentsStorage.ts: Empty file placeholder for shipment storage utilities.
frontend/src/lib/types.ts: Defines local types for user and client data while re-exporting shipment and invoice types from the backend.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Generates WhatsApp deep links for invoice reminders and support messages with formatted text.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, setting up React Query and the Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/clientAuthErrors.ts: Maps various error shapes and messages to concise, user-friendly authentication error strings.
frontend/src/utils/clientIdentifier.ts: Validates and normalizes email or mobile identifiers, returning type, normalized value, and user-facing errors.
frontend/src/utils/queryErrorMessage.ts: Converts React Query errors into safe user-friendly messages, delegating auth-related cases to clientAuthErrors.
frontend/src/utils/scrollToSection.ts: Smoothly scrolls the page to a target element with a fixed header offset.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using both query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and container settings with plugins enabled.
project_state.json: Project state describing admin login issues, existing feature requirements, and pending admin-auth backend fixes.
